mapper.select: SELECT submission.id AS id, submission.pmId AS pmId, user.id AS urId, user.fullname AS fullname, problem.name AS pmNm, submission.memoryUsed AS memoryUsed, submission.timeRun AS timeRun, submission.createTime AS createTime, submission.judgeStatus AS judgeStatus, submission.verdict AS verdict, language.name AS leNm FROM submission LEFT JOIN user on submission.urId = user.id AND user.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN problem ON submission.pmId = problem.id AND submission.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN language ON submission.leId = language.id AND language.deleteFlg = '0' WHERE submission.deleteFlg = '0' ORDER BY submission.createTime DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT submission.id AS id, user.id AS urId, user.fullname AS fullname, submission.pmId AS pmId, problem.name AS pmNm, submission.memoryUsed AS memoryUsed, submission.timeRun AS timeRun, submission.createTime AS createTime, submission.judgeStatus AS judgeStatus, submission.verdict AS verdict, submission.sourceCode AS sourceCode, language.name AS leNm, submitdetail.id AS sDlId, submitdetail.input AS input, submitdetail.output AS output, submitdetail.result AS result, submitdetail.answer AS answer, submitdetail.timeRun AS detailTimeRun, submitdetail.memoryUsed AS detailMemoryUsed, submitdetail.status AS detailStatus FROM submission LEFT JOIN problem ON submission.pmId = problem.id AND submission.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN user on submission.urId = user.id AND user.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN language ON submission.leId = language.id AND language.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN sn_sdl ON submission.id = sn_sdl.snId AND sn_sdl.deleteFlg = '0' LEFT JOIN submitdetail ON sn_sdl.sDlId = submitdetail.id WHERE submission.deleteFlg = '0' AND submission.id = #{snId}
